ValidationRule.description: when Renewal status is A, Quote Buyout must be "Payoff to Return, No Additional Renewals"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Quote_Buyout_Types__c) && !ISBLANK(Quote_Buyout_Types__c) && ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Status__c, 'A') && (!INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '37') || (INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '1') || INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '6') || INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '21') || INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '22') || INCLUDES(Quote_Buyout_Types__c, '20') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Renewal Status is Active, Quote Buyout must be "Payoff to Return, No Additional Renewals" please remove any other option and try again.
